060/**
061 *  The main entry point into the Blood Pressure Statistics Application.

063 * @version $Id: Application.java 125 2022-02-18 22:24:52Z tquadrat $
064 * @extauthor Thomas Thrien - thomas.thrien@tquadrat.org
065 * @UMLGraph.link
066 * @since 0.0.1
067 */
068@ProgramClass
069@ClassVersion( sourceVersion = "$Id: Application.java 125 2022-02-18 22:24:52Z tquadrat $" )
070@API( status = STABLE, since = "0.0.1" )
071public final class Application
072{

248        /*------------*\
249    ====** Attributes **=======================================================
250        \*------------*/
251    /**
252     *  The configuration for this application.
253     */
254    private final Configuration m_Configuration;
255
256        /*------------------------*\
257    ====** Static Initialisations **===========================================
258        \*------------------------*/
259    static
260    {
261        //---* Creates the importer and adds them to the registry *------------
262        registerImporter( new BlutdruckdatenCSVImporter() );
263
264        //---* Creates the reports and adds them to the registry *-------------
265        registerReport( new SimpleReport() );
266    }
267
268        /*--------------*\
269    ====** Constructors **=====================================================
270        \*--------------*/
271    /**
272     *  Creates a new instance for {@code Application}.
273     */
274    private Application()
275    {
276        //---* Retrieve the configuration bean *-------------------------------
277        m_Configuration = Configuration.getInstance();
278    }   //  Application()
279
280        /*---------*\
281    ====** Methods **==========================================================
282        \*---------*/
283    /**
284     *  Dumps the data from the database to the given file.
285     *
286     *  @param  dumpFile    The destination for the data.
287     */
288    private final void dumpData( final File dumpFile )
289    {
290        final var file = requireNonNullArgument( dumpFile, "dumpFile" ).toPath();
291        if( exists( file ) && !isRegularFile( file ) ) throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_InvalidFile, dumpFile.getAbsolutePath() ) );
292
293        final var folder = file.getParent();
294        if( !exists( folder ) )
295        {
296            try
297            {
298                createDirectories( folder );
299            }
300            catch( IOException e )
301            {
302                throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_CreateFolderFailed, dumpFile.getParentFile().getAbsolutePath() ), e );
303            }
304        }
305
306        final var timestampFormatter = new DateTimeFormatterBuilder()
307            .appendPattern( "yyyy-MM-dd HH:mm:ssX" )
308            .toFormatter( ROOT );
309
310        try( final var writer = new PrintWriter( new OutputStreamWriter( newOutputStream( file ), UTF8 ) ) )
311        {
312            writer.printf(
313                """
314                MERGE INTO %1$s
315                KEY( %2$s )
316                VALUES
317                """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA, COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY
318            );
319            try( final var connection = m_Configuration.retrieveConnection() )
320            {
321                try( final var statement = connection.createStatement() )
322                {
323                    final var sql = format(
324                        """
325                        SELECT * FROM %1$s
326                        """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA );
327                    try( final var resultSet = statement.executeQuery( sql ) )
328                    {
329                        var isFirst = true;
330                        while( resultSet.next() )
331                        {
332                            if( isFirst )
333                            {
334                                isFirst = false;
335                            }
336                            else
337                            {
338                                writer.println( "," );
339                            }
340                            final var timestamp = resultSet.getObject( 1, ZonedDateTime.class ).withZoneSameInstant( ZONE_UTC );
341                            final var systolic = resultSet.getInt( 2 );
342                            final var diastolic = resultSet.getInt( 3 );
343                            final var isIgnored = resultSet.getBoolean( 4 );
344
345                            writer.printf( "('%s', %d, %d, %B )", timestamp.format( timestampFormatter ), systolic, diastolic, isIgnored );
346                        }
347                        writer.println();
348                    }
349                }
350            }
351        }
352        catch( final SQLException e )
353        {
354            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_DatabaseAccessFailed ), e );
355        }
356        catch( final IOException e )
357        {
358            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_WriteToFileFailed, dumpFile.getAbsolutePath() ), e );
359        }
360    }   //  dumpData()
361    /**
362     *  Does the programs work.
363     *
364     *  @throws IOException An I/O issue occurred.
365     */
366    @SuppressWarnings( "RedundantThrows" )
367    private final void execute() throws IOException
368    {
369        //---* Import more data *----------------------------------------------
370        m_Configuration.getImportFile().ifPresent( this::importData );
371
372        //---* Dump the existing data *----------------------------------------
373        m_Configuration.getDumpFile().ifPresent( this::dumpData );
374
375        //---* Create a report *-----------------------------------------------
376        m_Configuration.getReportFile().ifPresent( this::generateReport );
377    }   //  execute()
378
379    /**
380     *  <p>{@summary Generates a report and writes it to the given
381     *  destination.} Whether this destination denotes a folder or a file
382     *  depends on the
383     *  {@link ReportFormat}.</p>
384     *  <p>Not all formats are defined for all
385     *  {@linkplain Configuration#getReportStyle() report styles}.</p>
386     *
387     *  @param  reportDestination   The destination for the generated report.
388     *
389     *  @see Configuration#getReportFormat()
390     */
391    private final void generateReport( final File reportDestination )
392    {
393        final var style = m_Configuration.getReportStyle();
394        final var format = m_Configuration.getReportFormat();
395        final var report = retrieveReport( style, format )
396            .orElseThrow( () -> new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_NoReport, style, format ) ) );
397        try
398        {
399            report.generateReport( reportDestination, format );
400        }
401        catch( final IOException | SQLException e )
402        {
403            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_ReportGenerationFailed ), e );
404        }
405    }   //  generateReport()
406
407    /**
408     *  Imports the contents of the given file.
409     *
410     *  @param  importFile  The file to import.
411     */
412    private final void importData( final File importFile )
413    {
414        if( !importFile.exists() )
415        {
416            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_FileIsMissing, importFile.getAbsolutePath() ) );
417        }
418
419        //---* Retrieve the import implementation *----------------------------
420        final var importer = retrieveDataImporter( m_Configuration.getImportSource(), m_Configuration.getImportFormat() )
421            .orElseThrow( () -> new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_NoImporter, m_Configuration.getImportSource(), m_Configuration.getImportFormat() ) ) );
422
423        //---* Get the data *--------------------------------------------------
424        try( final var connection = m_Configuration.retrieveConnection() )
425        {
426            //---* Get the data from the import file *-------------------------
427            final var data = importer.parse( importFile.toURI(), m_Configuration.getImportTimeZone().orElseGet( m_Configuration::getTimezone ), m_Configuration.getImportCharset().orElse( null ) );
428
429            //---* Prepare the insert statement *------------------------------
430            final var sql = format(
431                """
432                MERGE INTO %1$s
433                KEY( %2$s )
434                VALUES( ?, ?, ?, ? )\
435                """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA, COLUMN_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA_PRIMARY_KEY );
436            try( final var statement = connection.prepareStatement( sql ) )
437            {
438                //---* Insert the data *---------------------------------------
439                for( final var r : data )
440                {
441                    statement.setObject( 1, r.timestamp() );
442                    statement.setInt( 2, r.getSystolicPressure() );
443                    statement.setInt( 3, r.getDiastolicPressure() );
444                    statement.setBoolean( 4, r.isIgnored() );
445
446                    statement.execute();
447                }
448            }
449        }
450        catch( final IOException e )
451        {
452            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_ReadingFailed, importFile.getAbsolutePath() ), e );
453        }
454        catch( SQLException e )
455        {
456            throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_DatabaseAccessFailed ), e );
457        }
458    }   //  import()
459
460    /**
461     *  Initialises the application.
462     *
463     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
464     *  @return {@code true} if the initialisation was successful and the
465     *      application may proceed, {@code false} if it failed and the
466     *      application needs to terminate.
467     *  @throws IOException An I/O issue occurred.
468     *  @throws java.sql.SQLException   A problem occurred when initialising
469     *      the database.
470     */
471    private final boolean initialize( final String [] args ) throws IOException, SQLException
472    {
473        //---* Read the INIFile *----------------------------------------------
474        m_Configuration.loadINIFile();
475
476        //---* Parse the command line *----------------------------------------
477        var retValue = m_Configuration.parseCommandLine( args );
478        if( !retValue )
479        {
480            err.printf( "Error: %s%n", m_Configuration.retrieveParseErrorMessage().orElse( "??" ) );
481            m_Configuration.printUsage( err, "bloodpressure" );
482        }
483        else
484        {
485            //---* Check the database *----------------------------------------
486            try( final var connection = m_Configuration.retrieveConnection() )
487            {
488                var sql = format(
489                    """
490                    SELECT * FROM information_schema.tables
491                      WHERE TABLE_NAME = '%s'
492                        AND TABLE_SCHEMA = 'PUBLIC'\
493                    """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA );
494
495                boolean databaseIsInitialized = false;
496                try( final var sqlStatement = connection.createStatement() )
497                {
498                    try( final var resultSet = sqlStatement.executeQuery( sql ) )
499                    {
500                        databaseIsInitialized = resultSet.next(); // The table exists â¦
501                    }
502                }
503
504                if( isDebug() )
505                {
506                    sql = format(
507                        """
508                        SELECT table_schema, table_name FROM information_schema.tables\
509                        """, TABLE_BLOODPRESSURE_DATA );
510
511                    try( final var sqlStatement = connection.createStatement() )
512                    {
513                        try( final var resultSet = sqlStatement.executeQuery( sql ) )
514                        {
515                            while( resultSet.next() )
516                            {
517                                out.printf( "Schema: %s â Name: %s%n", resultSet.getString( 1 ), resultSet.getString( 2 ) );
518                            }
519                        }
520                    }
521                }
522
523                if( !databaseIsInitialized ) m_Configuration.initializeDatabase( connection );
524            }
525
526            //---* Check the name and birthdate *------------------------------
527            if( isNull( m_Configuration.getName() )  ) throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_NoName ) );
528            if( isNull( m_Configuration.getBirthdate() ) ) throw new ApplicationError( m_Configuration.getMessage( MSG_NoBirthdate ) );
529
530            //---* Save the settings *-----------------------------------------
531            m_Configuration.updateINIFile();
532        }
533
534        //---* Done *----------------------------------------------------------
535        return retValue;
536    }   //  initialize()
537
538    /**
539     *  The program entry point.
540     *
541     *  @param  args    The command line arguments.
542     */
543    public static final void main( final String... args )
544    {
545        try
546        {
547            final var application = new Application();
548            final var fakeArgs = new String []
549                {
550                    "--import", "data/export_2022-02-19T1708.csv",
551                    "--dump", "data/dump.sql",
552                    "--report", "data/simple.html",
553                    "--reportStyle", "simple",
554                    "--reportFormat", "HTML",
555                    "--reportStart", "2021-10-01",
556                    // "--name", "Thrien, Thomas",
557                    // "--birthdate", "1963-06-26"
558                };
559            if( application.initialize( fakeArgs ) )
560            {
561                application.execute();
562            }
563        }
564        catch( final ApplicationError e )
565        {
566            if( isDebug() || isTest() )
567            {
568                e.printStackTrace( err );
569            }
570            else
571            {
572                err.printf( "Error: %s", e.getLocalizedMessage() );
573                final var cause = e.getCause();
574                if( nonNull( cause ) ) err.printf( "Reason: %s", cause.getLocalizedMessage() );
575            }
576        }
577        catch( final Throwable t )
578        {
579            t.printStackTrace( err );
580        }
581    }   //  main()
582}
583//  class Application
